mapper.insert: INSERT INTO quoationAnswer (INQUIRY_ID, USER_ID, CONTENT, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT) VALUES (#{inquiryId}, #{userId}, #{content}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT ANSWER_ID as answerId, INQUIRY_ID as inquiryId, USER_ID as userId, CONTENT, CREATED_AT as createdAt, UPDATED_AT as updatedAt FROM quoationAnswer WHERE INQUIRY_ID = #{inquiryId} ORDER BY CREATED_AT ASC
